shop.title: Shop Name
shop.description: The name of the store. For https://EXAMPLE.com, the shop name is 'EXAMPLE'.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: WooCommerce API Key. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

api_secret.title: Secret Key
api_secret.description: WooCommerce Secret Key. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.
